omnik-local.title: Omnik inverter
omnik-local.subtitle: Enter your Omnik inverter IP address and WiFi S/N.

error.host_unreachable: Could not reach the Omnik inverter at this IP address. Make sure the IP address is correct and the inverter is on.
error.connection_timed_out: A timeout occurred while connecting to your Omnik inverter. Make sure the WiFi S/N is correct.
error.unexpected_response: Received an unexpected response from your Omnik inverter.
error.adding_device:
Something went wrong while adding the device.

It might be that the inverter has already been added as a device.

help.click_here_documentation: Click here to view the documentation.
